data.name: Noughts And Crosses Checker
data.description:
Noughts and Crosses is also known as "Tic Tac Toe".

You will be passed a list of moves in a game of Noughts and Crosses and will have to return the state/result of the game.

The list should contain only the numbers one to nine, which represent positions on the grid - 

1 2 3
-----
4 5 6
-----
7 8 9
-----

Player 'X' will always go first.

If any of these criteria are met the input list will be invalid and the function should return 'None'; the list exceeds 9 elements, the list contains anything but the numbers one to nine, a number occurs more than once or the play continues after a player has won. 

If player 'X' wins then the function should return 'X'

If player 'O' wins then the function should return 'O' 

If the grid is full and neither player has won the function should return 'D'

If the grid is not full and neither player has won the function should return 'U' - for unfinished.
